projects.title: MantoothUX.com
projects.description: Responsive portfolio website I designed and built with AI tools
projects.overview:
I built and managed my previous portfolio site through Squarespace. Squarespace is a trusted no-code solution, but I wanted more control over the structure, content, motion, and design details.

I challenged myself to design and build a new portfolio site in a week to test my proficiency with Cursor and other AI tools.
outcomes: Designed, built and launched this site in 4 days
"This is a pretty cool website" - You, probably
"I'm really proud of you, Joshua" - My Mom

projects.title: U.S. capitals quiz game
projects.description: Retro-style game I vibe coded in react
projects.overview: As a kid, one of my greatest feats in academia was my knowledge of all U.S. capitals. When my son became interested in learning states and capitals, I decided to create this game to help him learn. I wanted to create a game that was fun and engaging, but also educational. It took me about 5 hours to build, test, iterate and deploy.
outcomes: My son asks to play the game almost every day
"This is awesome! Did you really build it?" - My wife

projects.title: Shopify package management
projects.description: Increased shipping cost accuracy by enabling merchants to assign packages to individual product variants
projects.cardDescription: A feature that solved a top merchant frustration
challenges: Merchants could only set one default package for all products, causing incorrect shipping costs at checkout and tedious manual corrections
Large merchants can have thousands of product variants
Package management touches multiple surfaces across the admin, requiring alignment across domain teams
A short timeline requiring fast development while ensuring implementation quality
solutions: Designed and drove alignment on a product variant-level package management solution that emphasized ease of setup and scalability
outcomes: The feature was launched in Shopify Summer Edition 2025. It gained immediate and steady adoption, significantly improving shipping accuracy for thousands of merchants across 1 million+ product variants and counting.

projects.title: Order printer app
projects.description: Led design on the launch of new templates and crafted a future vision of the Shopify Order Printer app
projects.cardDescription: New templates and a future vision of the Shopify Order Printer app
projects.galleryFooter: *Future vision work is ongoing and confidential. Additional work samples can be shared offline
projects.overview:
Shopify Order Printer helps merchants customize, create and print important documents that streamline their fulfillment workflows.

I led design on an initiative to ship new templates, simplify the editing experience and incorporate AI for advanced customization.
challenges: Order Printer didn't offer baseline templates merchants needed
Templates required coding knowledge to make edits
Shopify merchants were paying for 3rd-party apps that provided more templates and easier editing
Several high-profile Shopify project launches relied on new Order Printer templates
highlights: Launched a no-code pick list template
Led design on a template refactor to work better with new features
Designed an improved no-code editor experience for all templates
Designed the future vision of the Order Printer app that incorporates Shopify Sidekick for AI-driven template creation and customization

projects.title: Shopify marketing automations
projects.description: Designed, launched and evolved a no-code automated email marketing platform that helped merchants engage with customers and grow sales
projects.cardDescription: End-to-end design from MVP launch to full-scale platform
projects.overview: Shopify automated email features were limited and required knowledge of code to make edits, which led merchants to pay for 3rd-party automated marketing services.
challenges: Shopify did not offer customizable marketing email workflows
Editing emails was clunky and required coding experience
Merchants were paying for 3rd-party automated marketing services
solutions: I collaborated with multiple designers and cross-functional teams to design an automated email marketing platform. The platform integrated functionality from two existing apps into a cohesive experience that offered:
A library of marketing automation templates
Metrics and reporting to help merchants monitor and improve their automated emails
projects.growthAndEvolution: After a successful launch, I spent the next year leading the vision, growth and evolution of the product. I established a series of collaborative, cross-functional design workshops that streamlined my team's process from concept design to production.

projects.title: Texas x Texas app
projects.description: Collaboratively designed and led user testing on a user-friendly government services app

projects.overview: Texas government online services were dated, poorly designed, disparate, unintuitive and untrustworthy. I collaborated with a small team at Deloitte Digital to design, build and test a user-friendly government services app. The app centralizes and simplifies the most common government services for Texans. The responsive website and mobile app launched in 2021.

about.headline: Hi, I'm Josh
bio: I'm a staff-level product designer with over 10 years experience solving complex problems and leading ambitious design projects for product orgs of all sizes. I'm passionate about designing stylish, intuitive solutions that work for real people at scale. Over the last year I've been incorporating AI tools into my process, and have become proficient at AI-assisted coding.
For the past 4+ years at Shopify, I led teams and designed features that help millions of merchants start, scale, and market their businesses.
Before UX design, I spent 7 years at world-class advertising agencies managing teams and clients through creative campaigns from ideation to launch. Check out my resume for the full story.
When I'm not working, you'll find me cooking, playing ice hockey, running, catching live music, or outdoors with my family.
